title: Bag encoding strategies in multiple instance learning problems

tldr.text: A tree-based encoding strategies that partition the instance feature space and represent the bags using the frequency of instances residing at each partition are proposed and it is shown that bag representation using tree ensembles provides fast, accurate and robust representations.
